content:
# I successfully harvested 10 iron ore, and my inventory now includes 1 Stone Furnace, 10 coal, 3 stone, and 10 iron ore. 

# Step 13: Now that I have the necessary materials, I will place the Stone Furnace down to begin smelting the iron ore into iron plates.

# Place the Stone Furnace in the current location.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Place the Stone Furnace on the ground.

# Step 14: After placing the furnace, I need to set it up to smelt the iron ore using coal as fuel.
# I will configure the Stone Furnace to smelt iron ore into iron plates.
configure_furnace(Prototype.StoneFurnace, input='iron-ore', output='iron-plate', fuel='coal')  # Set the furnace to smelt iron ore into iron plates using coal as fuel.

# Step 15: Finally, I will start the smelting process.
start_furnace(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Start the furnace to begin smelting. 

print(f"Stone Furnace is now set up to smelt iron ore into iron plates.")  # Confirm the setup.
